references.paper_title: SMPLer-x: Scaling up expressive human pose and shape estimation
references.reason: This paper is crucial as it details SMPLer-X, the foundational model that the current work, WHAC, fine-tunes and builds upon for camera-frame SMPL-X parameter estimation.

references.paper_title: Expressive body capture: 3d hands, face, and body from a single image
references.reason: This paper details the Expressive Body Capture (EBC) framework that WHAC also uses as a baseline method and builds upon.

references.paper_title: Deep visual slam for monocular, stereo, and rgb-d cameras
references.reason: This paper likely details the DROID-SLAM system used in other methods and potentially used as visual odometry system.

references.paper_title: Recovering accurate 3d human pose in the wild using imus and a moving camera
references.reason: This paper presents a method for 3D human pose recovery using IMUs and a moving camera, potentially providing a baseline or comparison point for WHAC.

references.paper_title: Amass: Archive of motion capture as surface shapes
references.reason: This paper introduces AMASS, a large motion capture dataset used in many existing works, that WHAC also used to create a new dataset.
